TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF ENGLAND EFFECTIVE INDEX SHOWS DOLLAR AT 101.6
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England's effective exchange rate index showed the U.S. Dollar at 101.6 compared with 101.7 previously. Other effective rates were = Australian dlr 55.7 ( 55.9 ) Aus Sch 137.5 ( 137.6 ) BFR con 99.9 ( 100.0 ) CAN 79.3 ( 79.3 ) DKR 92.7 ( 92.7 ) FFR 71.5 ( 71.6 ) DMK 146.4 ( 146.5 ) LIT 47.9 ( 47.9 ) YEN 219.6 ( 218.5 ) DFL 134.3 ( 134.4 ) NKR 79.3 ( 79.2 ) SKR 68.5 ( 68.5 ) SFR 172.3 ( 171.8 )
